location.title: Location
location.howToFindUsText: We are located on Herzl Street in the heart of Tel Aviv. The studio is easily accessible by public transport and there is street parking available nearby.

policies.title: Pricing & Policies
policies.feesText: Tattoo pricing depends on the size, detail, and placement of the design. Every project is unique â€” final pricing is confirmed after reviewing your request.
policies.pricingStandardsText: Rates are based on complexity, time, and materials. Minimum session rates apply. Detailed quotes are provided after consultation.
policies.depositsText: A non-refundable deposit is required to secure your appointment. Rescheduling is possible with at least 48 hours notice. No-shows forfeit the deposit.
policies.designPolicyText: Custom designs are created specifically for you and are not reused. Minor revisions are included. Major changes may require an additional fee.
policies.touchUpsText: One complimentary touch-up session is included within 3 months of the original appointment, provided aftercare instructions were followed.
policies.faqText: Common questions about the process, timing, and preparation will be answered here.
